A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this film. Not sure where all the hate is coming from for this film. I think many fans have forgotten that this is not The Original Trilogy 2.0. It is a new trilogy and the main characters are all the new characters Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, Kylo and Rose. Luke\, Leia and Han are passing the torch to the next generation. Their story is done and this was a great way to pass the flame on.
